alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 3:57PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Wasatch and south central Utah Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 356 PM MDT, mesonet observations reported a strong thunderstorm over Woodland Hills, or near Payson, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Mesonet. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Payson, Spanish Fork, Springville, Santaquin, Mapleton, Salem, Elk Ridge, Woodland Hills, Spring Lake, West Mountain, Genola and Birdseye. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 242 and 249. US Route 6 between mile markers 157 and 160, and between mile markers 175 and 193. US Route 89 between mile markers 304 and 312. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs
